title: Rodrigo Duterte
summary: Rodrigo Roa Duterte (/dəˈtɜːrteɪ/; Tagalog: [roˈdɾigo ɾowa dʊˈtɛɾtɛ] (listen); born March 28, 1945), also known as Digong, Rody[9] and by the initials PRRD,[10][11] is a Filipino politician who is the 16th and incumbent president of the Philippines and the first from Mindanao to hold the office.[12][13][14][15]
